body:
Comment 2: 
"go tool tour" should work, but only for the binary distributions.

It's currently broken, but not related to this issue. See:
https://golang.org/cl/8564043

Are you compiling Go from source? If so, you won't get the tour by default. You'll need
to install it with

  go get code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour
